actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Reported to House from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1371.
Measure laid on table in House, S. J. Res. 29 passed in lieu.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the week in November which includes Thanksgiving Day in each year as "National Family Week".

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1371) Authorizes the President of the United States to designate the week beginning on November 19, 1978, as "National Family Week."

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the week in November which includes Thanksgiving Day in each year as "National Family Week".
